short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick Lego Bricks from Pick-A-Brick at light-speed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrikPick is a powerful plugin that automates the process of buying Lego bricks from the official Lego Pick-A-Brick website. With BrikPick, you can easily select the bricks you need from a Rebrickable CSV file. With BrikPick's lightning-fast buying capabilities, you'll never have to waste time manually picking your bricks again. Get your hands on the bricks you need to build your creations faster than ever before with BrikPick!
